title: [RESOLVED] Server Issues - 28th Jan 2016
body:
Hi all,

**Update - 10:15am AEST**
All our game servers have fully recovered at this time and games are starting normally. We've disabled loss prevention and enabled ranked once more.   Good luck out there!

**Update - 10:15am AEST**
It looks like the cause of this is a network link that failed between our datacentres, preventing game servers from talking to our platform.  We're working on restoring connectivity and we should have everything up and running again shortly.

**Original Post**

We're aware of some server issues that may be impacting your ability to start / connect to games. We've disabled ranked as a precaution, and we are looking into it. I'll post updates as soon as I have them.


Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: lol  [RESOLVED] Server Issues - 28th Jan 2015 its 2015 boys

I have no idea what you're talking about...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Having probs logging in . .. are people sure this is fixed??
What kind of problems are you having logging in?  This issue should not have directly affected your ability to log in to the game.

played all day yesterday with no probs.  After patch this am, getting  "cannot connect to pvp server"  blah blah

My net is working fine for everything else 
Guess i'll keep trying.
Did you get logged in? I'm having the same issue.
logging in is fine? I just get stuck at champ select in ranked
what about the people who started a ranked? do we just sit on the reconnect screen until yous fix it? :)

Games that are trying to start right now will likely start eventually, although we've temporarily enabled loss prevention for games affected during the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar

Is this problem still ongoing? Haven't been able to get into this game. Keep getting this error message saying that the game has crashed and every time I try to reconnect it comes up with the same message.

You have disconnected. (I actually NEVER connected to the game. +1 loss ranked game thanks)  Please check your internet connection and try again.

Game Crashed Please try and reconnect to the game.   endless loop,            How can i fix it wtf ?

To anyone having "Game crashed try to reconnect" error, this is what worked for me: 
Uninstall any 3rd party applications (such as Wolf or teamspeak) and disable firewall.  This worked for me.
It says resolved but me and a couple other guys i know cant connect to games after the champion select finishes, it lost me 2 ranked games in the process too :?
The same thing happens to me, straight after champ select it just doesnt go to the loading screen plz fiz rito...

Hi Mindstar,

I'm having the same problem as some of these people, my client works perfectly up until the end of champ select, where instead of taking me to the loading screen pre-game, it does one of two things, either just takes me to the reconnect screen, or an error comes up with "Lolclient.exe has stopped working", and THEN I go back to the reconnect screen.
I was playing last night and it was fine, but I have not been able to play since the patch update (I'm not sure if this is related). I have been trying to get into custom games for most of the day, and it has not been working.

I'm writing this because I'm not really sure what else to do, I've tried everything that I can think of, including restarting my computer, restarting the client, repairing it etc.

I am with TPG, and I am in Canberra.

I'll just sit tight and hope it gets resolved, but any additional help or information you could give me would be wonderful.
Thanks.

Thanks for the detailed description here.  

When you see the "Lolclient.exe has stopped working" screen or get taken back to the reconnect screen, how long does that take to come up - is it instant or does it take some amount of time?
Let me just check that for you.
It's basically instant, maybe 2 or 3 seconds, although that could be to do with the computer rather than the issue.

Thanks for replying. 

For now, I'd suggest you make sure you go through the steps here - [bug splats and game crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), and potentially try a [fresh reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

Let me know how it goes.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi, I'm currently looking through the first link you suggested, but I have a question about the second. It says that reinstalling League will ensure there are no corrupted or out of date files, but is that not what the repair does? I just want to make sure that it has benefits that wouldn't come from the repair, as reinstalling League is a long and arduous process.

Hi again,

Good news! I performed a clean boot of my computer and tried again, and it let me into the game. 

Does this mean that a different application is causing the game to crash? And if so, is the only way to find that application to go through, rebooting the computer with a different application enabled each time?

Thank you for your help. <3
SO all you did was restart youre pc no reinstalls or anything?

So a clean boot is where you disable all applications that run at startup (except the essentials obviously) and then restart the computer. You do this because if it works after the clean boot, you know that it is an application that is causing the problem, then you can pinpoint it and deal with it. There are instructions on how to do a clean boot here: 
(For Windows) https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/929135
(For Mac) https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201262

Hope it helped :)
No it didnt work for me sadly... Thank you for trying to help tho but i simply still cant get into the game after champ select this sucks badly and idk when this will be fixed hopefully soon
Anybody else unable to log in since this patch? The message I get is "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server."
I still cant get into game. what do i do?
Shop not working?
Hey riot, I am having issues trying to connect to the game after champ select. Tried to hit reconnect several times, only for the client to crash instantly. This did not happen before the patch

Hey

Thanks for letting us know. It sounds like there might be some ongoing issue here, possibly related to a particular location or ISP...

What ISP are you with?  What city are you in?

Mindstar

I am still having Problems whenever I get into a game it says 'you have been disconnected, please check youre internet and try again' this was after my league crashed and i and I had to scan files. I have restarted my internet and everything and i have still been having this problem and i cant reconnect to my ranked game and ik i will get a ban and we will get a loss...

After the game i tried customs and Im still having the same porblem could someone please Help me?? riot plz halp
Having problems loading in, says the last patch is still active and is rejecting it.... DOH
it still doesn't work for me? and i got a ranked loss and low priority que...

It's still happening.

I did a repair from the initial loading screen then tried to create a Custom vs AI game.

"The game has crashed."
"Please try to reconnect to the game."

You seem to think the issue is resolved so what else am I meant to do?

Hi,

This was a server side issue, I wouldn't have expected it would require you to repair your client.  That makes me think there might be some other issue in your case.  Given we patched today, it might be worth going through these articles to make sure your client is fully patched and healthy:

* [Patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)
* [Bug Splats and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Cheers
Mindstar
So I'm confused is the Patch live or not because I want to play the New Shen and he doesn't seem to be updated.{{champion:98}}  I want joo.

[The patch is live](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/EO8yML3j-patch-62-is-live) indeed.  The server issues mentioned in this thread were unrelated to the patch itself, just unfortunate timing :'(
but i haz no shen {{item:3070}}
Just realised you are posting on an NA account - this is the OCE boards.  NA has not yet been patched.

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=zcrEGeXl,comment-id=000b000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-28T01:26:27.718+0000)
>
> Just realised you are posting on an NA account - this is the OCE boards.  NA has not yet been patched.

i am oce it said 2015 not 2016 lol nice fix bro
Is it broken again? Games stuck on loading screen.
Hey I played a ranked game when it happened ant it says loss prevented but I still got a loss on my promos so now I am 3 wins 4 losses not 3 wins 3 losses plz remove a loss

hi guys not sure if its the same issue but im randomly getting disconnected from my games, my ping spikes up to 500 and i get the attempting to reconnect thing every 20-30 seconds, ive checked my internet connection (stable 40 mgs down/10 mgs up) and my computer is great (can handle much more than league of legends) i cant understand what the problem is ive tried restarting router reinstalling league everything i can think of its happened 3 times in as many days now and always seems to be random, sorry if it is unrelated to this issue but i posted in report a bug and my post just got removed, so i figured at least my issue will get noticed here hopefully
Cannot reconnect to my ranked game? help
and now i dont get loss prevention and get a low priority queue? wtf?

My friend was getting this problem last night and now he has 5 20 minute queues and it wasn't his fault that he dc'ed and wasn't able to reconnect, would you be able to remove his queues, Summoner name - Enkor Soar

Hi,

This issue specifically occurred this morning between **09:45 and 10:15am AEST**, so issues last night would likely be unrelated.

If your friend has issues like this regularly, I'd get them to check out our [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article.

Cheers
Mindstar
When will this be fixed? PWEASEEEE

I just finished my ranked game and the stats wouldn't load for 5mins. Choose to skip and it says my game is still going, asking my to reconnect, only there is no game to reconnect to. It's as if the game never existed.

UPDATE: game history has finally refreshed, if you finished a game just as the disconnection issues occurred then you should be fine.
